channel.title: Kafka Connect ArangoDB Sink Connector on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Kafka Connect ArangoDB Sink Connector on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: ArangoDB Sink Connector Configuration Properties
item.description: Connection connection.endpoints type: list Database connection endpoints as comma separated list of host:port entries. For example: coordinator1:8529,coordinator2:8529. connection.user type: string default: root Database connection user. connection.password type: string Database connection password. connection.database type: string default: _system Target database name. connection.collection type: string Target collection name. connection.acquireHostList.enabled type: boolean default: false Periodically acquire the list of all known ArangoDB hosts in the cluster and trigger tasks reconfiguration in case of changes.
